DOC.detailed_description: This in-vitro study design collect data regard color appearance new developed indicator strip ( NEW NORMA-SENSE ) come contact , in-vitro , vaginal secretion elevate pH , measure buffer capacity vaginal secretion non-symptomatic subject symptomatic subject , detect indicator strip ' performance come contact urine .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women , age 18 45 , without symptom vaginal infection . 2 . Subjects ready sign inform consent form . 1 . Subjects unable unwilling cooperate study procedure . 2 . Subjects currently participate another clinical study may directly indirectly affect result study . 3 . Subjects suffer vaginal bleeding menstruate . 4 . Subjects sexual relation within last 12 hour . 5 . Subjects apply local antiseptic , antibiotic vaginal treatment within last 3 day . 6 . Subjects apply vaginal douching within 12 hour prior visit clinic .
